tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerInjuryHistory (
    player_id INT,
    injury_date DATE,
    injury_type VARCHAR(255),
    recovery_start_date DATE,
    recovery_progress FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Recovery (
    recovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    injury_id INT NOT NULL,
    recovery_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    recovery_start_date DATE,
    recovery_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE player_injury_history (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    injury_date DATE NOT NULL,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    recovery_status VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, injury_date)
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_progress (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    recovery_date DATE NOT NULL,
    recovery_description TEXT,
    recovery_duration INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, recovery_date)
);

CREATE TABLE player_profile (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE team (
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    home_stadium VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_schedule (
    game_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    game_date DATE NOT NULL,
    opponent_team_id INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (game_id)
);
